articles.title: Aryan Khan was framed in drugs case, witness tells Mumbai Police - India Today
articles.description: A witness in the Mumbai cruise drugs case recorded his statement with the Mumbai Police on November 4 and claimed that the raid on October 2 was pre-planned and Aryan Khan was framed by certain individuals in order to make money.
